lines: You are fiddling around in the kitchen on a Saturday afternoon trying to prepare a snack.
*selectable_if (false) #GIVE UP AND GO TO A FAST FOOD PLACE
#GIVE UP AND GO TO A FAST FOOD PLACE
#GIVE UP AND GO TO A FAST FOOD PLACE
You mix a little of this and a little of that. You taste it. It's missing something. What do you think you should add?

EUREKA! THAT'S IT! You create a new taste sensation. You share it with your friends, who rave about the taste. One friend, who is in marketing, believes you could probably sell it to a certain fast food MacCompany for a handsome
You prepare a presentation to the chairman of the board. The idea falls MacFlat. Sorry!
MacGratulations! Your product is accepted!!! You earn approximately $1,000,000 in Resources. You become an overnight legend in the fast food business.
You may have just walked away from a very large sum of money!
After awhile you lose your appetite and look for something else to do.
On the way to the fast food place, your car breaks down. You never make it there. A tow truck brings you home.
You munch on a piece of cheese here and a couple of chips there. Nothing that really satisfies your appetite. The afternoon passes uneventfully.
On the way to the fast food place, you notice a car pulled to the side of the road, the driver, a woman, has a pained expression on her face.
The woman is sweating profusely and in obvious discomfort. You notice that she is pregnant and realize that she is about to have her baby. What will you do?
There's not enough time. The contractions are only a few seconds apart!
You have deserted this woman in her time of need, probably because you were too squeamish to try helping her. Fortunately, someone else got to her in time and helped her.
"WAAAAAAAAAAA!!!!!" You did it! The woman tearfully thanks you and promises that she will send you pictures of the baby as it gets older. She does, and eventually you become friends.
The woman in the car was about to have a baby. You passed her by in a time of real need.
